definition: Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)

sentences.english: Ham was standing by the door, while Emily was sobbing in Daniel's arms.
sentences.chinese: 哈姆站在門邊，埃米莉倒在丹尼爾的臂彎裏哭泣。

sentences.english: But as I stood before Daniel, I knew that it does matter.
sentences.chinese: 然而，當我面對着丹尼爾，我知道到這非常重要。

sentences.english: Danielle thought a moment. "I've never heard of him."
sentences.chinese: 丹尼爾沉吟片刻，“我從來沒聽說過他。”

sentences.english: Nobody ever read them. And some of them were older than Daniel.
sentences.chinese: 沒人再讀了，有些比丹尼爾的年紀還大。

sentences.english: Daniel is under suspicion by the police for robbery.
sentences.chinese: 警方懷疑丹尼爾犯下槍案。

sentences.english: McDaniel is chair of the department of psychology at the University of New Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 麥克丹尼爾是美國新墨西哥大學心理系主任。

sentences.english: Daniel is reading in the spacious classroom.
sentences.chinese: 丹尼爾正在寬敞的教室裏讀書。

sentences.english: Instead, Orlando Magic first-round draft pick Daniel Orton has learned patience.
sentences.chinese: 然而奧蘭多魔術首輪秀丹尼爾奧爾頓得先學會耐心。

sentences.english: He entered an exhibit showing how the circulatory system works.
sentences.chinese: 丹尼爾帶着他的循環電路系統參加了這次展覽。

sentences.english: The engine comes out of Dr. Daniel's think factory at the University of Wisconsin.
sentences.chinese: 這臺引擎是威斯康辛大學丹尼爾博士科研中心發明的。

sentences.english: That afternoon, in the golden light of dusk, Daniel let go.
sentences.chinese: 那天下午，在金燦燦的黃昏日光中，丹尼爾落下去了。

sentences.english: Dani Jarque was a defender for the team and served on Espanyol in his whole life.
sentences.chinese: 作爲後衛的丹尼爾雅爾克一生均在西班牙人隊踢球。

sentences.english: Oh, how was the recruit Daniel?
sentences.chinese: 哦，丹尼爾，招募新兵如何？

sentences.english: Daniel Orton’s knee will cause him to miss the preseason.
sentences.chinese: 丹尼爾奧爾頓的膝傷可能讓他錯過季前賽。

sentences.english: In the past, I have overlooked Danielle's underhanded behavior in order to save our friendship.
sentences.chinese: 過去，爲了挽救我們的友誼，我原諒丹尼爾告密行爲。

definition: middle period of a tripartite provincial exam (in former times)/midfield/mid-court (in sports)/half-time/intermission half-way through a performance
Werther, opera by Jules Massenet/Werther, German masculine given name
